thread.section_title: Airline Ticket Centre.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airline Ticket Centre.ca | www.airlineticketcentre.ca
thread.title: Mona
thread.title_full: Airline Ticket Centre.ca reviewed by Mona

author: Mona
title: Mona
text:
We don't travel a lot, maybe two or three times a year but we always use Sherry at Airline Ticket Centre when we do.
She is so helpful at getting us set up with seat selection and flight options.
Sherry has been available even after-hours when we had problems signing in to a flight or when we couldn't find of reference numbers.
We use her for booking our flights, purchasing park tickets and transportation as well as travel health insurance for our family.
Sherry is the best! We have used her services for many, many years and will continue to do so!
